SamPy.focus.FocusPlotsÂ¶

Creates few different plots from the focus data.

HISTORY: Created on Sep 10, 2009 Added to the repository on Dec 3, 2010

author:

Sami-Matias Niemi
todo:
  1. change focus trend since mirror move to two x axis mode (one with date)
  2. Create a new plot: all focus data since last mirror move, fit functions

Functions

FocusTrend(xmin, xmax, title, type, ...[, ...]) Plots Focus trend since given minimum J-L date (mxin).

FocusTrendSinceDayZeroOLD(title, output, ...) @deprecated: This function is no longer used. Please see the other two functions.

Classes

DateFormatter(fmt[, tz]) Tick location is seconds since the epoch.
FormatStrFormatter(fmt) Use a format string to format the tick
MonthLocator([bymonth, bymonthday, interval, tz]) Make ticks on occurances of each month month, eg 1, 3, 12.
MultipleLocator([base]) Set a tick on every integer that is multiple of base in the
NullFormatter Always return the empty string
YearLocator([base, month, day, tz]) Make ticks on a given day of each year that is a multiple of base.
